title: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Divinez Genma Seisen-hen

alternative_titles.ja: カードファイト!! ヴァンガード DivineZ 幻真星戦編

synopsis:
Akina and his friends, having strayed into the Fantasma, find their path blocked by "Fantôme Fighters".

The only ones who can stand against them are the special "Mythisch Fighters" chosen by the cards.

What is a Fantôme Fighter—

The collective name for those who confront reality and fight to protect the fabricated.

What is a Mythisch Fighter—

The collective name for those who withstand the Fantôme and fight to protect the real.

Will the parallactic be erased, or will it become the verity?
—Stand up and fight with your existence on the line.

(Source: Official Twitter)
